meanings.sent1: She misbelieved that the sun revolved around the Earth.
meanings.sent2: He misbelieved the rumor about his friend without verifying it.
meanings.sent3: The cat misbelieved that the vacuum cleaner was a monster.
meanings.sent4: His misbelief in magic made him misbelieve that he could fly.
meanings.sent5: The child misbelieved that eating carrots would give him superpowers.

meanings.sent1: They misbelieved that the world was flat.
meanings.sent2: She misbelieved that the store closed at 9 pm instead of 8 pm.
meanings.sent3: The dog misbelieved that the mailman was a threat.
meanings.sent4: His misbelief in luck made him misbelieve that he would win the lottery.
meanings.sent5: The student misbelieved that studying the night before the test would guarantee an A grade.
